bio.name: CY Lim
bio.description: I am a full stack software engineer who recently decided to quit full-time jobs and start my digital nomad lifestyle.

projects.name: Pollen Stores
Bilingua
projects.short: Platform for users to exchange languages.
projects.description: Language exchange app for foreign language conversation practice. Chat, play and learn with native speakers. Find the best conversation exchange partners!
projects.contribution: My task in this project is to fix the Twilio Video WebRTC bugs for React Native app.

projects.name: i-nie
projects.description: This app allows you to consolidate all your personal assets information and share it with your nominees. Keeping your nominees informed of the assets that you may have. Non Physical assets such as: - Banking accounts: Savings, Current or Fixed Deposits. - - Investments: Stocks, Mutual funds, etc - Insurance: General, Life, Medical, etc.

projects.name: Ryze Music
projects.description: Ryze Music is a creative space for artists to pursue their musical passion and for fans to connect with the artists in their journey to the top. As an artist, share your story, your music, your vision. Get funding and produce your next single. Album. Concert. Tour.
projects.contribution: It is a six weeks MVP project with mobile first responsive design requested by clients. The app is developed with MEAN(MongoDB, Express, AnuglarJS, Nodejs) stack with AgendaJS for the cronjob and MailGun for the mailing list.

projects.name: Superday
projects.short: Categorise user daily activities and provide reports.
projects.description: Save time with this robust lifelogging app for iPhone that focuses on improving daily productivity. Superday shows where your time leaks and suggests fixes.
projects.contribution: The app developed in RxSwift and MVVM architecture for better code management and functionality. My tasks in the project are to fix bugs and improve user experiences. Besides that, I helped to implement a wheel system for choosing the category.

projects.name: TABLEAPP Merchant
projects.description: A multi-languages iOS application for Restaurant Manager to manage reservations, rest time.
